What You Get

Upscale hotels in Playa del Carmen, at walking distance from our wellness beachfront lounge and restaurant.

Signature cuisine, wellness treatments and rituals, daily yoga classes.

Wellness room service from our lounge, beach chaise longue, airport transfers.

Our Core Wellness Features

Signature Cuisine

Enjoy the magic of delicious, plant-based cuisine cooked by a master chef during your vacation.This wholesome food will unify your body, mind, and spirit at both cellular and holistic levels.

Irrefutable scientific data confirms that a whole-food, plant-based diet is ideal for helping your cells, organs, and body stave off disease, achieve and maintain your ideal body weight, enhance exercise performance, and generally sustain a healthy life.

Wellness Treatments and Rituals

Discover a new depth of serenity and awareness through our uniquely orchestrated massage techniques.Our signature, restorative massage remedies leave long-lasting benefits in the body, mind, and spirit.

Massage treatments alternate daily with our Flagship Wellness Rituals that include high vibration and organic essential oilsthat are concentrated on pressure points and energy centres, which bring about a sense of deep release, balance, and connection.

Yoga Practice

Slow down. Stabilize your inner compass. Tune into your intuition. Build your strength. Absorb the knowledge of experienced instructors.

In each class, teachers approach both beginning and advanced learners individually. Classes are available throughout the day and take place in an open beachfront studio.

Increasing research shows the effectiveness of yoga in maintaining and restoring physical health, emotional balance, and sense of self.

Why Book With Us

A healthy lifestyle is the only life we know. It serves as the sole focus behind all the vacatione going to devote tpackages we design. If you arime and money for vacations, why not Go Healthy? We are an exceptional guarantee of lifestyle authenticity and quality and truly believe that “healthy vacations last forever!” We strive to enrich, inspire, and nourish your beneficial lifestyle going forward.

Hoteliers and Property Owners

We welcome select property owners in Playa del Carmen, Tulum, Los Cabos, and Nuevo Vallarta. Contact us to explore options for hosting our guests at your property or bringing the benefits of Go Healthy lifestyles to your clients.

Travel Professionals

Promote wellness vacations in luxury hotels to your clients. Go Healthy Travel is the only full service wellness vacations provider in Playa del Carmen. Let‘s start working together. Your clients will love you for it.

Events and Meeting Planners

Our beachfront lounge, local logistics and experience are great reasons to start the conversation and successfully host your event in Playa del Carmen.We create special, blissful experiences and memories for your clients.

We‘d Love Your Feedback

Tell us about your stay with us, or how we can help you plan for your dream vacations.You can also just say hello if the idea of healthy, conscious vacations resonates with you.

Daniel Seymour

Chief Healthy

Daniel is a Holistic Aromatherapist, Certified Teacher of Transcendental Meditation and a Maharishi Ayurveda Consultant. Daniel‘s international wellness experience brings richness and depth to Go Healthy Travel programs.
